An Answer to the white minister's declaration
4 p.
[s.n.], London : Printed in the Year 1699.
Caption title. Imprint from colophon. An answer to Joseph Perkins' "The white minister's declaration, or, The meaning of the white scarf and girdle explained", dated 1699. Reproduction of original in: Lambeth Palace Library (London, England)
